title: New: tree – Universal (ft. Ariel Thiermann)
content:
Wow, am I glad I read my emails tonight.

This new track from California’s Tree is a wonderfully diverse affair, swinging between melancholic piano balladry, to harmonica driven folk-pop, touching on hip hop elements along the way. Sampling the sound of s ‘homies gameboy played through an arpeggiator’, you’re unlikely to hear a song as vibrant, intense or simply enjoyable as Universal for the rest of the year. Check it out below, and grab a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
